channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exactly 13 Years From Today Is A ‘Christmas Eclipse’ — Where To See It
item.description: A total solar eclipse on December 26, 2038, will be visible in parts of Australia and New Zealand.

item.title: The Holiday Dissonance: Why AI’s Real Gift This Season Isn’t Efficiency—It’s Permission To Protect Your Sanity
item.description: This holiday season, AI isn’t just about efficiency—it’s your permission to reclaim rest. Learn how artificial intelligence can reduce decision fatigu...

item.title: The $40 Billion Healthcare AI Failure—And The EMR Divide Sabotaging Progress
item.description: Healthcare is investing billions in AI, yet most projects fail to scale. This analysis examines the EMR Divide and why only 4% of organizations achiev...

item.title: How To Rethink Your Job As AI Agents Reshape Work
item.description: AI agents are beginning to automate routine work across every profession, changing how jobs are structured and where humans add value.

item.title: iPhone Air 2 Release Date Now In Question After New Leak
item.description: When is the next iPhone Air expected? Well, a new report has good news for those impatient for the update.
